name: Lullaby in Dreams
description:
Lullaby in Dreams is an adventurer game aimed at children, with an emphasis on CGIs to tell the story. Inspired by classics from the 90s, the game was designed to have a low poly look using current production methods.

The player will face challenges with traps and mysteries, through an isekai, unlocking skills and discovering hidden secrets, all in the midst of a game of intrigue and trying to find his sisters.

Input method: Keyboard + Mouse: Mouse to move the camera, WASD for movement. Shift to run, space to jump. Talk to NPCs by pressing E.

Language: The game automatically changes the language according to the system language, with English being the default language.
